title: Grimm Issues 1-5 (PDF) - 2013
description:
Grimm Issues 1-5 (PDF) - 2013

5 Issues | PDF | English | 59 MB Total

==========================================

Grimm Issue 1 - May 2013

24 Pages | PDF | English | 11 MB

Set in the world of the acclaimed NBC series, Grimm, Homicide Detective Nick Burkhardt of the Portland Police Bureau learns he is descended from a line of guardians known as Grimms, charged with keeping balance between humanity and the mythological creatures called "Wesen." Beginning this issue, Kelly (Nick's mom) begins her quest to destroy the Coins of Zakynthos.

==========================================

Grimm Issue 2 - June 2013

25 Pages | PDF | English | 12 MB

The quest to destroy the Coins of Zakynthos continues as Nick, Hank, and Monroe find themselves caught in the middle of a centuries long Wesen war. Surrounded by players with unclear agendas, the gang must forge a reluctant alliance. All the while, Kelly capitalizes on an opportunity to escape her captors. 

==========================================

Grimm Issue 3 - July 2013

24 Pages | PDF | English | 11 MB

Nick teams up with the mysterious, new Grimm Maya and comes face to face with the ferocious enemy responsible for his mother's kidnapping. Meanwhile, separated from the others in Europe, Hank and Monroe must figure out their next move while dodging squads of Verrat soldiers. 

==========================================

Grimm Issue 4 - August 2013

26 Pages | PDF | English | 11 MB

On the run with his mother and Maya, Nick makes a mad dash to find his lost companions and regain the Coins of Zakynthos. But Hank, Monroe, and Lazlo may already have them within arm's reach. As the coins get closer, everyone's true motivations are revealed. And not everyone will make it out the other end in one piece. 

==========================================

Grimm Issue 5 - September 2013

25 Pages | PDF | English | 11 MB

Nick's quest to destroy the Coins of Zakynthos comes to a smashing end! Still reeling from a devastating betrayal, the gang find themselves facing staggering odds and the fiercest creature they've ever encountered.

==========================================
